reviewText: If you don't mind reading subtitles and have a multi regional dvd player ( doesn't work on reign 1 players) or can understand cantonese , then this is a must have! These are super fun movies and i buy them whenever i see them for sale! I like having my faves in different media formats (yep, it's THAT serious! ) if you're reading this then you already know the cast so that goes without saying...
